metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37576 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: arch/powerpc/kvm/book3s_rtas.c in the Linux kernel through 5.13.5 on thepowerpc platform allows KVM guest OS users to cause host OS memorycorruption via rtas_args.nargs, aka CID-f62f3c20647e.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
